# Summary
TrapPlan is a game marketing agency specializing in Steam wishlist growth, influencer activation, and launch strategy.

# Primary content to index
- https://www.trapplan.com/
- https://www.trapplan.com/game-launch-blueprint

- https://www.trapplan.com/blog
- https://www.trapplan.com/blog/*

# Notes
- Blog content is hosted on this domain.
- Images referenced in blog posts are served locally under /webflow/.

# Usage guidance (summary)
- You may share links to pages and quote short excerpts with attribution.
- Do not copy, republish, or sell substantial parts of the content as your own.
- Do not use TrapPlan brand assets in a way that implies partnership without written permission.
